lg.l: A favorite Scotch Song.
Says my Uncle I pray you dis-co-ver what has been the cause of your woes
that you whine and you pine like a loverI've seen Molly Mogg of the rose
O Nephew your grief is but follyin Town you may have better progg
Half a Crown there will get you a Molly-·-a Molly much better than Mogg
Half·a·Crown·there·will·get·you·a·Molly
a·Molly·much·better·than·Mogg. (2)
The School Boys delight is a play day The Masters delight is to Flogg
The Milkmaids delight is on May dayBut mine is in sweet Molly Mogg
Will a Wisp leads the Trav'ller a gaddingThro' ditch and thro' quagmire and bogg
But no light can e'er set me a maddingLike the Eyes of my sweet Molly Mogg.(3)
For Guineas in other Mens breeches Your Gamesters will palm and will Cogg
But I envy them none of their richesSo I palm my sweet Molly Mogg.
I know that by Witts 'tis recitedThat Woman at best are a Clogg
But I'me not so easily frightedFrom loving my sweet Molly Mogg.(4)
Who follows all Ladies of Pleasure In pleasure is counted a Hogg
All the Sex cannot give so good MeasureOf joys as my sweet Molly Mogg
The Heart which half wounded is changingIt here and there leaps like a Frogg
But my Heart can never be ranging'Tis so fix't upon sweet Molly Mogg.(5)
I feel I'm in love to distraction My Senses quite lost in a Fogg
And nothing can give satisffactionLike thinking on sweet Molly Mogg
A Letter when I am inditingComes Cupid and gives me a jogg
And I fill all my Paper with writingOf nothing but sweet Molly Mogg.(6)
If I would not give up the three Graces I wish I were hang'd like a Dog
And at Court all the Drawing Room FacesFor a glimpse of my sweet Molly Mogg
Those Faces want Nature and SpiritAnd seem as cut out of a logg
Juno Venus and Palas's meritUnite in my sweet Molly Mogg.(7)
Where Virgil alive with his Phillis And writing another Eclogue
Buth his Phillis and fair AmarillisHe'd give up for my sweet Molly Mogg
When she smiles on each Guest like her liquorThen Jealousy set me a gogg
To be sure she's a bit for the VicarSo I shall loose sweet Molly Mogg.Y29-26X4
